metadata.title: CVE-2023-24038 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The HTML-StripScripts module through 1.06 for Perl allows _hss_attval_styleReDoS because of catastrophic backtracking for HTML content with certainstyle attributes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-24038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhtml-stripscripts-perl - 1.06-1ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libhtml-stripscripts-perl package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.06-1ubuntu0.22.04.1').
